entry.title: fable-compiler/Fable.Solid
entry.summary:
Fable bindings for SolidJS

Fable.Solid

Fable bindings for SolidJS. You can use it in combination with Feliz.JSX.Solid to write React-like apps without a Virtual DOM.

To test run npm install && npm start.

Note: Requires Fable 4 (in beta at the time of writing)
